title: Why can't we buff Katarina
body:
Kat has been nerfed when urf 2015 came out
SHE SHOULD BE BUFFED{{champion:55}}

replies.body: Because she isn't broken enough already?

> [{quoted}](name=jb3navides,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=lahnHvFw,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2015-04-23T00:25:22.880+0000)
>
> Fine as is.... Now she has to keep going and going in team fights straight away rather than wait and take time to get the best opportunity to make use of her resets. Just smack her with CC.

but really, doesn't every kat just keep going and going until they get a pentakill? she is basically the same as before lol
Sorry guys for saying that she's fine.{{champion:55}}
Wasn't even a nerf, dosnt stop her face rolling the enemy team at all
